text: Gene Vuckovich (born March 9, 1936) is a Democratic member of the Montana Legislature.http://votesmart.org/candidate/120749/gene-vuckovich#.UflfR2RxtHs He was elected for Senate District 39, representing the Anaconda, Montana area, in 2010. Vuckovich was a former city-county manager of Anaconda-Deer Lodge County. As per Article VI, Section 6 of the Constitution of the State of Montana and Montana Code 2-16-511 to 2-16-513, he is fourth in the gubernatorial line of succession, after Lieutenant Governor Mike Cooney, President of the Senate Scott Sales, and Speaker of the House of Representatives Greg Hertz. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Montana Democrats Category:Montana state senators Category:1936 births Category:21st-century American politicians Category:People from Anaconda, Montana
title: Gene Vuckovich
